about.bio: Boris mai haɓaka yanar gizo ne wanda ke aiki a Forbes. Video Hub App shiri ne na gefe wanda aka kirkira tare da Electron da Angular. {intl_donated} na kowane siyarwar wannan software an bada gudummawar ne ga {intl_amf}, wata babbar kyauta ta {intl_givewell}.
about.creator: Mahaliccin
about.p1: Gudummawa suna zuwa ga {intl_amf} (AMF) saboda ita babbar kyauta ce ta {intl_givewell}, mai kimanta sadaka mai zaman kanta. Duk $ 2 da aka baiwa AMF na kare mutane biyu daga zazzabin cizon sauro na tsawon shekaru 3-4.
about.p2: Boris yana bayar da aƙalla 10% na kuɗin shigarsa ga ƙungiyoyi masu saukin kuɗi (duba {intl_givewell}) tun a shekarar 2011. Tallace-tallace daga wannan software ɗin zai ba da ƙarin gudummawa ga ƙaunatacciyar sadakarsa.
about.title: Game da
about.whydonate: Me ya sa ba da gudummawa?

blog.donation_text: {intl_donated} daga kowane siye zuwa {intl_amf}, wata babbar kyauta ce ta {intl_givewell}.

carousel.more6: Bude bidiyo daga sikirin da ka latsa
carousel.moremore4: Irƙiri jerin waƙoƙi daga sakamakon bincike

carousel.tags4: Tag yiwa kai tsaye cikakke yayin ƙarawa ko bincika

contact.heading: Tambayoyi? Sharhi? Neman fasali? Rahoton bug?
contact.reason: Da fatan za a zaɓi dalilin da ya sa za a miƙa hannu:
contact.title: Saduwa

download.after_text: Za a kai ku zuwa shafin saukarwarku kamar yadda za a yi imel da hanyar haɗi don saukarwa. Aƙalla shekara guda daga farkon sayanka zaka sami damar zazzage sabon sigar software a kowane lokaci. Idan ka rasa hanyar haɗi, tuntuɓi ni kawai.
download.limited: Iyakance ga bidiyo 50 a kowace cibiya
download.paying_text: Duk intanet ɗin ana sarrafa shi ta hanyar intl_stripe} ko kuma {intl_paypal} tare da aikin biya na {intl_chec}.
download.title: Zazzagewa
download.whypay: Me yasa za ku biya abin da kuke so?
download.whypay_text: Ina son mutane da yawa su iya amfani da software, saboda haka farashin ya yi ƙasa da yadda ya kamata, amma kuma ina so in sanya duniya ta zama wuri mafi kyau, saboda haka {intl_donated} daga kowane siye zuwa {intl_amf}, saman -ka bayar da sadaka ta hanyar intl_givewell}. Da fatan za a yi la'akari da biyan duk yadda kuke ganin ya dace.

faq.file_support: Waɗanne nau'in fayil ne app ɗin ke tallafawa?
faq.file_support_version_3_answer: Allyari akan haka zaku iya yin Video Hub App don shigo da kowane nau'in fayil: kawai ƙara shi a cikin saitunan.
faq.heading: Tambayoyi akai-akai
faq.multifolder: Zan iya shigo da fayil sama da ɗaya a cikin cibiya ɗaya?
faq.multifolder_a1: Video Hub App 3 (wanda za'a sake shi a ƙarshen 2020) zai baka damar yin hakan a sauƙaƙe.
faq.multifolder_a2: Video Hub App 2 zai samar da cibiya daga dukkan manyan fayilolin da suke cikin babban fayil da ka zaba. Babu wata hanyar da za a fadawa Video Hub App 2 don shigowa daga sama da tushen tushe (farawa).
faq.multifolder_a3: Akwai mafita guda biyu masu yiwuwa:
faq.multifolder_a4: Createirƙiri cibiyoyi da yawa, kuma zaku iya canzawa tsakanin su tare da dannawa 1 (kawai kunna cikin saitunan don nuna cibiyoyin kwanan nan) a cikin labarun gefe na hagu.
faq.multifolder_a5: Createirƙira alama don duk manyan fayilolin da kuke so a cikin babban fayil ɗin, kuma ƙirƙirar cibiya daga wannan babban fayil ɗin.
faq.multifolder_version_3_answer: Je zuwa saituna, danna 'Hub na yanzu', danna 'Shirya manyan fayiloli' don ƙara ƙarin manyan fayiloli.
faq.privacy_policy_a1: Ka'idar ba ta aika da kowane bayanai ba. Duk bayanan ku suna zama masu sirri a kan kwamfutarka.
faq.q1: Ta yaya zan ƙirƙiri sabon cibiya?
faq.q1_answer: Danna kan gear (saman dama) don samun damar 'menu na saituna'. Danna maɓallin farko don fara mayen 'mayen'.
faq.q2: Zan iya samun cibiya sama da ɗaya?
faq.q2_answer: Kuna iya samun ɗakunan yawa (tarin) kamar yadda kuke so. Wataƙila kuna son Abubuwan Bidiyo na Gida, Fina-Finan, da Ayyukan Gwaji a cikin daban, tarin daban. Kawai ƙirƙirar cibiyoyi uku! Kuna iya canzawa tsakanin su ko dai ta danna fayil ɗin sau biyu, jawo fayil ɗin a cikin aikace-aikacen, ko danna sunan hub a cikin jerin tarihin kwanan nan a cikin aikace-aikacen.
faq.q3: Menene ya faru da fayilolin bidiyo na?
faq.q3_answer: Duk bidiyon ku basu canza ba. Video Hub App yana ɗaukar hotunan kariyar bidiyo kawai don zaku iya samfoti su a kowane lokaci. Idan bidiyon suna kan rumbun kwamfutar waje zaka iya ganin su a cikin Video Hub App ko rumbun kwamfutar yana haɗuwa ko a'a. Amma danna bidiyon zai buɗe shi kawai a cikin na'urar kunna bidiyo idan an haɗa rumbun kwamfutar ta waje.
faq.q4: Menene ya faru lokacin da bidiyo na suka canza?
faq.q4_answer: Idan ka kara, goge, ko sake suna duk wani bidiyo, kawai danna 'Rescan directory' da Video Hub App zasu sabunta abubuwan cikin su don dacewa da canje-canjen ka. Har sai kun 'Rescan kundin adireshi', duk tsofaffin bidiyon zasu nuna a cikin Video Hub App, amma danna kan bidiyon da kuka goge ko kuka sake suna ba zai sake kunna bidiyo ba. Sake shirya kundin adireshi yana da sauri, kuma daga baya Video Hub App zai nuna sabunta ra'ayi game da bidiyon ku.
faq.q5: Zan iya tsara bidiyo ta kwanan wata?
faq.q5_answer: Da fatan za a je saituna, danna maballin 'Saitunan Bincike', gungura zuwa 'Yanayin zaɓuɓɓuka a cikin jerin zaɓuka', sannan danna 'Kwanan Kwancen da aka Gyara' don ba da damar zaɓin jeri.
faq.q6_answer: Kuna iya jawowa & sauke hoto daga compter din ku akan kowane bidiyo, kuma za'a maye gurbin tsoho hoton. Hakanan, zaku iya zaɓar ɗayan ɗayan sauran hotunan kariyar da aka fitar don zama sikirin aiki na asali ta hanyar buɗe takardar / cikakken bayanin bidiyo (danna dama -> cikakkun bayanai, ko danna saman kusurwar dama-dama na hoto a cikin Hoton Hotuna) da danna kusurwar dama-dama (tauraruwa) na kowane hoto.
faq.q7_answer: Kuna iya kunna maɓallin 'Kunna duka' a cikin saituna. Lokacin da ka danna shi, duk bidiyon da ke nuna yanzu a cikin gidan yanar gizon ka za a buɗe a matsayin jerin waƙoƙi tare da duk shirin da kwamfutarka ke amfani da shi don buɗe fayilolin '.pls'. Kawai sanya ɗan bidiyon ku tsoho don buɗe fayilolin '.pls'.
faq.q8_answer: Duba shafin 'gajerun hanyoyi' a cikin menu na saituna don cikakken jerin gajeren hanyoyin gajerun hanyoyi.
faq.start_a1: Sanya sunan tarin ku (cibiya), misali 'Bidiyo Na'.
faq.start_a2: Danna 'Zaɓi kundin adireshin bidiyo', babban fayil ɗin kwamfutarka inda bidiyo ɗinku suke.
faq.start_a3: Danna 'Canza hub directory', babban fayil dinda kake son samun Video Hub App ya adana duk bayanan game da wannan cibiya.
faq.start_a4: Zaɓi girman hotunan kariyar da kuke son Video Hub App don cirewa
faq.start_a6: Bari mu ce kun sanya wa cibiyar ku suna 'My Videos'. Video Hub App zai cire hotunan kariyar kwamfuta daga duk bidiyon da ka zaba sannan ka sanya shi a cikin wani jaka mai taken 'vha-My Videos' a cikin kundin adireshin da ka zaba.
faq.start_a7: Allyari, Video Hub App zai adana fayil 'My Videos.vha2' a cikin babban fayil ɗin. Yanzu duk lokacin da ka danna 'My Videos.vha2', matattararka zata buɗe nan take, koda kuwa bidiyon suna kan rumbun waje.
faq.title: Tambayoyi akai-akai | Tambayoyi

general.description: Binciko, bincika, kuma tsara bidiyon ku
general.title: Video Hub App

givewell.q1: Mayar da hankali kan shirin tare da kyakkyawar shaidar tasiri da tsadar rayuwa.
givewell.q2: Tsari don tabbatar da cewa gidajen sauro sun isa ga wadanda suka karba da kuma lura ko sun kasance a cikin gidaje kuma cikin kyakkyawan yanayi na dogon lokaci.
givewell.q3: Daki don karin kudade - mun yi imanin AMF za ta iya amfani da ƙarin kuɗi don isar da ƙarin raga.
givewell.q4: Nuna gaskiya - AMF ta ba da babban bayani game da aikinta tare da mu kuma muna iya bi da kuma fahimtar aikinta a hankali.

guide.adding_heading: Ƙara sabbin bidiyo zuwa tarin ku
guide.adding1: Idan kun ƙara sabon bidiyo zuwa babban fayil wanda VHA ke kallo (an kunna 'babban fayil ɗin kallo' a cikin tab 'Current hub' a cikin saituna), VHA zai ƙara shi a cikin hoton ku. A madadin za ku iya danna 'rescan' a cikin shafin 'Current hub' a cikin saituna.
guide.adding2: Idan bidiyon bai fito ba, da fatan za a duba cewa ba ku da matatun bincike (a cikin labarun gefe) wanda zai ware bidiyon (alal misali sabbin bidiyo ba su da ƙimar tauraro amma a halin yanzu kuna tace bidiyon da ke sama da taurari 3) .
guide.adding3: Kuna iya rarrabe bidiyo ta 'Times Times' (ba a kunna sabbin bidiyo ba don haka zai bayyana a saman). Hakazalika, kuna iya rarrabewa ta 'Kwanan kwanan wata' don haka sabbin fayilolin akan kwamfutarka su bayyana a saman.
guide.adding4: Idan kun ƙara ƙimar tauraro a duk fayilolinku, kuna iya tace (a cikin labarun gefe) don bidiyon da ba a tantance su ba (don haka ne kawai aka nuna bidiyon 'N/A'); yanzu lokacin da kuka ƙara ƙimar tauraro zuwa bidiyo, zai ɓace daga gani a cikin gidan ba kamar yadda bai dace da ƙa'idodin tacewa ba (taurarin 'N/A').
guide.current1: Shafin 'Cibiyar yanzu' yana ba ku damar, tsakanin sauran ayyuka, don:
guide.current2: Ƙara ko cire manyan fayiloli daga cibiya
guide.current3: Sake duba babban fayil, ƙara sabbin bidiyo da cire duk fayilolin da kuka goge
guide.current4: Canza ko VHA ya kamata ya 'duba' don canje -canje a cikin babban fayil
guide.current5: Sake haɗawa zuwa babban fayil 'shigar' wanda aka sake masa suna ko kuma aka canza shi
guide.current7: Share ƙananan hotuna daga bidiyo da aka goge
guide.current8: Fara sabar gida wanda zai ba ku damar haɗi zuwa cibiyar ku ta waya ko kwamfutar hannu - kamar 'remote control' don TV.
guide.current9: Dubi ƙididdiga game da fayilolin bidiyo a cikin cibiya ta yanzu. Wannan bayanin ya haɗa da: adadin fayiloli da manyan fayiloli, girma dabam, tsawon lokaci, girma da dai sauransu.
guide.current10: Don tsaro, fasalin 'sarrafa nesa' yana kashe duk lokacin da kuka kashe VHA ko ku canza zuwa wata cibiya daban. Yayin da uwar garken 'remote control' ke gudana, duk wanda ya haɗu da WiFi ɗin ku kuma ya tafi adireshin da aka bayar zai iya ganin hotunan allo a cibiyar ku.
guide.heading: Jagorar Mai Amfani
guide.layout_intro: Da ke ƙasa akwai shimfidar ƙirar Video Hub App.
guide.layout1: Toolbar - Maballin don canza yadda app ɗin yake aiki. Kuna iya saita waɗanne maɓallan da aka nuna ko aka ɓoye anan cikin menu na saiti.
guide.layout2: Bincika, rarrabuwa & tace - Wannan gefen gefen shine inda kuke yin bincikenku kuma ku ƙuntata sakamakon tare da haɗin matattara (ƙima, girman fayil da tsawon lokaci, da sauransu).
guide.layout3: Ƙananan hotuna - Babban taga taga yana nuna sakamakon zaɓi. Kuna iya zaɓar ra'ayoyi daban -daban a cikin kayan aiki tare da gajerun hanyoyin keyboard.
guide.layout4: Tray na ƙasa - Alamar ƙasa na iya nuna kowane ɗayan shafuka biyar. Shafin 'Tag' zai ba ku damar bincika da bincika alamunku, gami da ƙara alamomi zuwa bidiyo da yawa lokaci guda ta hanyar 'Yanayin Batch'. Tare da 'Cikakkun bayanai' kuna iya sauƙaƙe shirya bayanan bidiyon da aka danna na ƙarshe. Kuna iya ɓoyewa ko nuna shafuka ta shafin 'Duba saituna' section 'sashin ƙasa'.
guide.layout5: Saituna - Yana buɗe taga saitunan, wanda halayen shirin da fasalullukan sa za a iya daidaita su ta shafuka 5.
guide.main1: 'Babban saituna' yana da zaɓuɓɓuka iri -iri, gami da:
guide.main5: bude bidiyo na yanzu azaman lissafin waƙa
guide.main6: canza bidiyon da kuka fi so
guide.main7: nuna ko ɓoye zaɓi na sharewa a cikin menu na dama na dama
guide.main8: duba ko an saki sabon sigar VHA
guide.move1: Kuna iya motsa hub ɗin ku<hub_name> .vha2 a ko'ina muddin ka ajiye shi kusa da vha-<hub_name> babban fayil (kawai rufe VHA da farko). Lura: don Allah sanya shi a cikin hanyar babban fayil wanda ba shi da sarari a ciki (misali 'C: \ fina -finai \' ba 'C: \ fina -finai na ba'). Yanzu danna sau biyu akan fayil .vha2 kuma hub ɗinku yakamata yayi aiki kamar da.
guide.move2: Idan kuna son matsar da 'babban fayil ɗin shigarwa' (inda duk bidiyon ku suke) zuwa wani wuri, babu matsala (kawai rufe VHA da farko). Bayan kun buɗe app, za ku ga wannan:
guide.move3: Bidiyoyin ku suna bayyana da alamar rawaya a kansu, kuma lokacin da kuka danna, VHA ta ce 'Ba a haɗa babban fayil ɗin bidiyo' ba. Lura: wannan kuma na iya faruwa idan kun adana bidiyon ku akan rumbun kwamfutarka na waje, amma lokacin da kuka haɗa shi, kwamfutarka ta yi masa alama da harafi daban kuma VHA yanzu ba ta 'gani' ba.
guide.move4: Zaɓin: zaɓi madadin<hub_name> .vha2 fayil (kwafi zuwa wani wuri kawai idan akwai; lura: babu buƙatar kwafa vha-<hub_name> babban fayil.
guide.move5: Je zuwa saituna → 'Dandalin yanzu', sannan danna 'Ba a haɗa ba' (yayi kama da rubutu amma maɓalli ne).
guide.move6: Wurin lilo (daga tsarin aikin ku) zai sa ku zaɓi babban fayil a sabon wurin sa.
guide.move7: Nemo babban fayil ɗin a cikin sabon wurin sa, danna shi, sannan danna maɓallin 'Zaɓi babban fayil'.
guide.move8: Da fatan za a danna kowane bidiyo don tabbatar da cewa yana aiki.
guide.move9: Idan kun buɗe VHA kuma yana nuna kuskuren 'Fayil ɗin da ba a samo ba:', saboda saboda lokacin da kuka buɗe VHA yana ƙoƙarin buɗe cibiyar da kuka duba ta ƙarshe. Kar ku damu: kawai rufe VHA, nemo cibiya a kan kwamfutarka, kuma danna sau biyu a kai. Yanzu VHA za ta san inda za a sami cibiya.
guide.movefolder_heading: Matsar da cibiyar ku zuwa wani wuri daban
guide.rating1: Ƙara ƙima zuwa bidiyo mai sauƙi ne: kawai danna kan tauraron da ya dace don fayil ɗin da aka zaɓa.
guide.rating2: Don cire ƙima, danna kan ƙimar yanzu (misali tauraro na 4 na ƙimar tauraro 4).
guide.rating3: Yayin da kuke tantance fayiloli, ginshiƙai masu shuɗi sama da mai zaɓin ƙima (labarun gefe)
guide.renaming1: A cikin bayanan fayil, danna kowane ɓangaren sunan kuma shirya yadda ake so. Danna 'Shigar' don karɓar gyara, ko 'Esc'. don sokewa. Ko kuma za ku iya danna fayil ɗin dama ku danna 'sake suna'
guide.search1: Shafin 'Saitunan Bincike' yana ƙunshe da tacewa, bincike, da rarrabuwa sama da 30 waɗanda za ku iya amfani da su a cikin kowane haɗin da ake so don taimaka muku samun bidiyon da kuke so.
guide.search2: Zaɓuɓɓuka da yawa a cikin 'Saituna' suna da alamar ido kusa da su. Alamar hagu mafi yawan tana nuna ko an kunna ko kashe zaɓin. Ikon buɗe ido yana nufin wannan maɓallin zai bayyana a cikin kayan aiki, alamar rufe ido yana nufin gunkin ba zai bayyana a cikin kayan aikin ba. Danna shi don kunna gani. Za a iya kunna maɓalli amma har yanzu a ɓoye daga sandar kayan aiki.
guide.search3: Zaɓuɓɓuka da yawa suna da alamar 'i' kusa da su. Tsugunnawa gunkin zai ba da ƙarin bayani game da saitin.
guide.search4: Muna ba da shawarar ku yi wasa tare da zaɓuɓɓuka da fasali iri -iri, har sai kun sami saitin da kuka fi so.
guide.search5: Kila koyaushe kuna sake saita duk saituna da maɓallan zuwa ƙimomin su na asali, a cikin 'Babban saiti' shafin section 'Saitunan daban -daban'.
guide.search6: Akwai sashin 'Nemo kwafin' wanda zai ba ku damar samun kwafin bidiyon ku (ta tsawon lokaci, girman, ko daidai wasa).
guide.settings1: Yawancin saituna, fasali da zaɓuɓɓuka ana samun su kuma ana iya daidaita su ta hanyar saiti (alamar cog, saman-dama).
guide.settings2: Saituna ba takamaiman cibiya ba ce. Za a ci gaba da daidaita saitin ku ko da wace cibiya za ku buɗe.
guide.settings3: An raba sashin Saituna zuwa manyan shafuka 5:
guide.shortcuts1: Shafin 'Gajerun hanyoyi' yana ba da gajerun hanyoyin keyboard zuwa ayyuka da yawa da ake samun dama akai -akai.
guide.shortcuts2: Kuna iya sauƙaƙe gyara gajerun hanyoyin ta danna kan gajeriyar hanya, sannan danna sabon maɓalli akan maballin ku.
guide.shortcuts3: Don cire gajeriyar hanya, danna shi da farko, sannan danna maɓallin da aka sanya yanzu.
guide.start1: Ka yi tunanin Video Hub App azaman YouTube akan kwamfutarka. Yana ba ku damar sauƙaƙe bincika, bincika, rarrabuwa, da tsara tarin bidiyon ku.
guide.start2: Bayan ƙaddamar da App Hub Video (VHA) a karon farko, masihirci zai jagorance ku ta hanya mai sauƙi na ƙirƙirar sabon tarin fayil ɗin bidiyo, wanda ake kira 'hub'.
guide.start3: Wizard ɗin zai ɗauke ku ta wasu ƙananan matakai na ƙirƙirar takaitaccen hotuna, hotunan kariyar kwamfuta, da shirye -shiryen bidiyo. Zaɓi girman, tsawon lokaci, da adadin duk waɗannan abubuwan; sune tushe don samfotin shirye -shiryen ku da yin bincike ta tarin ku.
guide.start4: VHA tana ƙirƙirar cibiya a matakai biyu. Da farko yana ɗaukar bayanan bidiyo (tsayi, girma, ƙuduri), bidiyo za su fara bayyana a cikin cibiyar ku amma ba za su sami hotunan allo ba tukuna. Lokacin da aka gama matakin farko, VHA zata fara samar da takaitattun hotuna. A kowane mataki mashaya ci gaba da kimanta lokacin da ya rage zai bayyana a kusurwar dama.
guide.start5: Cibiya,<hub_name> .vha2, shine 'database' kuma ana adana duk hotunan kariyar kwamfuta a cikin vha-<hub_name> babban fayil. Kaddamar da VHA zai buɗe cibiyar ta atomatik da kuka gani. Kuna iya motsa fayil ɗin .vha2 da babban fayil ɗin da ke tare, amma kuna buƙatar haɗa su gaba ɗaya don hotunan kariyar kwamfuta don nunawa.
guide.start6: Don ƙirƙirar wata cibiya, danna maballin 'Saituna' tab 'Babban saiti' shafin → 'Ƙirƙiri sabuwar cibiya'.
guide.start7: Hakanan kuna iya ƙara manyan fayiloli kamar yadda kuke so zuwa cibiya ta yanzu: danna maɓallin 'Saituna' → shafin 'Yanzu' → 'Shirya manyan fayiloli' → 'Ƙara babban fayil zuwa hub'.
guide.tagging_batch1: Ana iya sanya alama ga fayiloli da yawa lokaci guda ta amfani da 'Yanayin Batch' a cikin 'Tag' tab a cikin tire ɗin ƙasa:
guide.tagging_batch2: Danna maɓallin 'Yanayin Batch' a cikin shafin tags na tire ɗin ƙasa.
guide.tagging_batch3: Danna kan kowane bidiyon da kuke son sanya alama. Lura alamar 'alama' tana bayyana akan duk fayilolin da aka zaɓa.
guide.tagging_batch4: Yanzu danna alamar da ake so a cikin tire ɗin ƙasa. Za a ƙara shi zuwa duk fayilolin da aka zaɓa.
guide.tagging_batch5: Yi la'akari da lambar kusa da alamar a shafin 'tags'. Wannan lambar tana nuna adadin fayilolin da aka yiwa alama tare da wannan alamar. Yayin da kuke sanya alama ga fayiloli da yawa, adadin zai ƙaru daidai.
guide.tagging1: Zaɓi daga kowane ɗayan wurare huɗu inda zaku iya ƙara alama zuwa bidiyo:
guide.tagging4: Zaɓuɓɓukan 'Cikakkun bayanai' lokacin da kuka danna saman-dama na bidiyo a cikin 'Duba takaitattun hotuna'. Hakanan zaka iya buɗe wannan fitowar ta riƙe maɓallin 'CTRL' kuma danna bidiyo
guide.tagging5: Hakanan zaka iya jawo alamun daga tire ɗin ƙasa zuwa takaitaccen hoton bidiyo a cikin babban taga
guide.tagging6: Ƙirƙiri sabon alama kawai ta hanyar buga sunan tag da buga maɓallin 'Shigar' akan allon madannin ku. Idan kuna shigar da alamar da ta riga ta kasance, za ku ga cika-cika a cikin shuɗi; za ku iya danna maɓallin 'Tab' a kan madannin ku don kammalawa. Za a sanya alamar zuwa fayil ɗin da aka zaɓa, kuma zai kasance don kammalawa don wasu fayiloli.
guide.tagging7: Don cire alama: yawo akan tag a kowane fayil, 'x' zai bayyana sama da alamar, danna kan 'x' don cire alamar.
guide.thank_you_oren: Godiya ga Oren don ƙirƙirar wannan jagorar mai amfani
guide.thumbnail1: Dama danna fayil, danna 'Cikakkun bayanai'. Daga takaddar tuntuɓar takaitaccen hoto, ya hau kan ƙaramin hoton bidiyo da ake so kuma danna tauraron da ya ɓace a saman kusurwar dama. Tauraron zai yi haske da rawaya: wannan shine sabon ƙaramin yatsa. Don warwarewa, sake danna tauraron da aka zaɓa. Danna maɓallin 'Esc' akan allon madannin ku ko danna waje daga cikin shirin don fita.
guide.thumbnail2: Don ƙara takaitaccen hoto na bidiyo, za ku iya ja da sauke fayil ɗin hoto 'jpg' ko 'png' daga comptuer ɗinku akan kowane bidiyo a cikin 'Duba takaitattun hotuna'
guide.title: Jagorar Mai Amfani
guide.using_search1: Kuna iya bincika ta tarin tarin bidiyon ku ta amfani da fayil da sunayen manyan fayiloli, alamomi, bayanan bidiyo; sannan tace sakamakon ta amfani da kimar tauraro, girman fayil, tsawon lokaci, da sauransu - a cikin kowane haɗin gwiwa. Yankin ƙaramin hoto zai nuna zaɓin ku a cikin ainihin lokaci.
guide.using_search2: Zaɓin 'zaɓuɓɓukan rarrabuwa' zai ba ku damar rarrabe sakamakon ta hanyoyi da yawa, kawai kunna ko kashe su a shafin 'Saitunan Bincike' a cikin saiti.
guide.using_search3: Shigar da kowane ɓangaren babban fayil ko sunan sunan fayil a filin da ya dace
guide.using_search4: Danna kan alama, daga shafin 'Tag' a cikin tray ɗin ƙasa, don saka shi cikin 'Tag ɗin sun haɗa' filin bincike
guide.using_search5: Shift-danna kan alama don saka shi cikin filin 'Tag ba su da'
guide.using_search6: Rubuta sunan alama a cikin 'Tag ɗin ya haɗa da kowane' filin bincike (boolean 'ko')
guide.using_search7: Shigar da rubutu cikin binciken 'bayanin kula' don nuna bidiyon da ya haɗa da wannan rubutun a ɓangaren bayanan
guide.view1: Wannan shafin yana ƙunshe da kayan aiki sama da 30 waɗanda ke sarrafa yadda ake kallon shirye -shiryen bidiyo da nuna su, da kuma yadda ƙirar aikace -aikacen take. Kamar cikin shafin 'saitunan bincike', zaku iya sarrafa waɗanne kayan aikin suke aiki, da kuma kasancewar su a cikin kayan aikin
guide.view2: Ana rarraba duk kayan aikin a cikin sassan fiye da 10 don sauƙin kewayawa.
guide.view3: An gayyace ku don yin gwaji tare da saitunan daban -daban - yana da lafiya: akwai maɓallin don dawo da ƙa'idar zuwa saitunan tsoho.

home.every_os: Yana aiki iri ɗaya ba komai komai OS ɗin da kuke amfani da shi
home.feature1_text: Tsayar da kan hoto don ganin hotunan kariyar kwamfuta
home.feature2_text: Filin fim yana nuna hotunan kariyar kwamfuta daga kowane bidiyo
home.feature3_text: Duk hotunan kariyar allo daga kowane bidiyo lokaci ɗaya
home.feature4_text: Ara kowane haɗin zaɓin bincike don nemo abin da kuke so
home.feature5_text: Sake suna, ƙara alama, taurari, da bayanin kowane bidiyo
home.like_youtube: Yi tunani kamar YouTube don bidiyo akan kwamfutarka
home.step1_text: daga kwamfutarka, rumbun kwamfutarka na waje, ko cibiyar sadarwar komputa
home.step2_text: lamba da girman hotunan kariyar kwamfuta da shirye-shiryen bidiyo
home.step3_text: fara yin bincike ko da yayin da aka samar da hotunan kariyar kwamfuta
home.tagline: Binciko, bincika, kuma tsara bidiyon ku

notfound.pleasevisit: Da fatan za a ziyarci ɗayan waɗannan shafukan:

reviews.filecroco: ingantaccen aikace-aikacen mai sauƙin sauƙi wanda ke taimaka muku kiyaye bidiyoyinku cikin tsari
reviews.findmysoft: sarrafa tarin bidiyo ɗinka cikin yanayi mai kyau da inganci
reviews.softpedia: hanya mai sauri, mai salo don gudanar da abun cikin bidiyo akan kwamfutarka

share.appreciate: Ina godiya da duk wata gudummawa
share.donate: Da fatan za a ba da gudummawa
share.heading: Idan kana son manhajar
share.thankyoutext: Inganta manhaja wata ƙwarewa ce ta kanta kuma kamfanoni suna kashe kuɗi da yawa akan sa. Ni mai kirkirar guda ne kuma zanyi matukar godiya idan kuka raba kalmar game da app dina
share.title: Raba
share.upvote: Da fatan za a ci gaba

thankyou.linkdescription: Don saukar da sabuntawa nan gaba: a cikin imel ɗin ya kamata ku ga oda 'Ref: #' wanda zaku iya amfani da shi don saukar da sabon sigar daga wannan gidan yanar gizon:
thankyou.thankyoutext: Na gode don siyan App Video Hub. Yakamata ku karɓi imel tare da hanyoyin saukarwa a cikin 'yan mintuna kaɗan.
thankyou.title: Na gode da siyan ku
